name: The Frog King
description:
When I was a kid, my dad bought an illustrated book with all the tales by the Grimm brothers. Their wonderful stories made my sister and me dream about witches, griffins, musician animals and very smart foxes. We were very happy with it.

Sadly, many years later, my dad gave the book away and we just kept the good memories it gave us.

Today I'm excited to be able to make a digital version of some of their tales available to take with you and read wherever you go, in a kinetic novel format with cute an colorful illustrations and characters to fall in love with.

Many generations like you and me have enjoyed the amazing stories told by the Grimm brothers. Their stories have stood the test of time and are now part of the collections of many families around the world.
